name: diskcare
description: Disk bakımı ve temizlik için güvenli, açıklanabilir ve testli CLI.
author: DiskCare Contributors

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:packages: npm -w @diskcare/scanner-core run build && npm -w @diskcare/rules-engine run build
scripts.test:packages: npm -w @diskcare/scanner-core run test && npm -w @diskcare/rules-engine run test
scripts.test: npm run test:packages && npm run test:cli
scripts.ci: npm run format:check && npm run build && npm run test
